author: Simon Carswell, Jack Horgan-Jones
title: Covid-19 clusters now in 100 nursing homes
description: More than half of clusters in east of country, HPSC figures show
content:
The number of coronavirus infection clusters in nursing homes around the country has reached 100, according to the latest detailed figures on Covid-19 cases released by State officials.
The States Health Protection Surveillance Centre disclosed more detailed… [+2994 chars]
